abstract: Investment banks have always prized discretion among employees. But at Goldman Sachs, a public persona can be a liability.
snippet: Investment banks have always prized discretion among employees. But at Goldman Sachs, a public persona can be a liability.
lead_paragraph: Allen Mask, a former Goldman employee who now works at Google, is pursuing his passion for hip-hop music.

headline.main: At Goldman, Pressure on Staff to Keep a Low Profile
